articles.content:
A low-key Twitch streaming alternative
Image: Epic Games

articles.author: Allison Johnson
articles.title: LG says Android 12 update will be offered for some of its phones - The Verge
articles.description: LG may offer Android 12 updates to some of its phones even after it exits the smartphone business. The company doesn’t have a great update track record, though flagships like the LG Wing and V60 might be in line for one final Android OS upgrade.
articles.content:
Some phones may get an additional platform upgrade, but LG doesnt have a great track record
The LG V60 launched in early 2020 could be on the list for an Android 12 update.
